content:
I do not have personal beliefs or values; i can provide an objective analysis of the song's lyrics.

the song "for the world" by toto expresses the values of unity, equality, and peace. the lyrics emphasize the importance of coming together as a human race to overcome the challenges facing the world. it highlights the need to put aside our differences and work towards a common goal of creating a better future for all. additionally, it promotes the idea of treating others with compassion and kindness, as we are all part of the same global community.
